markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 20"
    pfs=""
>
[The Midwife](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2511)
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Stolen Fate</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Unique" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=161" />
<trait label="Artifact" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=253" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Necromancy" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=117" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Pathfinder #191: The Destiny War](/Sources.aspx?ID=199) pg. 76

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** carried

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

_The Midwife_ represents the arrival of new life or new information, particularly via the aid of another. As long as you have _The Midwife_ invested, it grants a +2 item bonus to [Medicine](/Skills.aspx?ID=9) checks. This increases to a +3 bonus if you are at least 17th level.

**Activate** <actions string="Reaction" /> command;  **Frequency** once per day; **Trigger** A creature you can sense within 60 feet would die or be destroyed;  **Effect** You prevent the target from dying or being destroyed and restore to the target 6d8+24 Hit Points. This effect can prevent a [death](/Traits.aspx?ID=40) effect or [_disintegrate_](/Spells.aspx?ID=76) from slaying a target. The amount of healing granted increases to 7d8+28 if you're at least 15th level, 8d8+32 if you're at least 17th level, and 9d8+36 if you're at least 19th level.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: The Midwife
